name: Spectral_Alpha
description:
This is a prototype build of a stealth game for a masters project. Most functionality is present but very raw.

Your goal: Sneak around and steal valuable items. Change your colour to that of items in your inventory to hide from guards.

Move with PS3 analogue stick or WASD.

Use gamepad buttons or IJKL keys for item interaction.

Cycle through your inventory using PS3 L1/R1 or -/+ keys.
